item.title: Have old physical shares? We can help you dematerialize them
item.description: We often hear stories from investors, on social media and in real life, about holding physical share certificates; even discovering ones that belonged to their parents or grandparents. Today, SEBI no longer permits the transfer of physical shares, except in specific cases like inheritance. So, holding shares in demat form isn’t just more convenient and secure, it’s essential if you want to do anything with them. We see this as a real issue and want to help.
